sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About This Application

This is a simple yet efficient Inventory Management System designed to help users manage products seamlessly. It allows users to view, add, edit, and delete products efficiently.

Key Features:

  • 📦 Product Management: Add, edit, and delete products with ease.
  • 🔍 Search & Filter: Quickly find products using the built-in search functionality.
  • 🛡 Secure Authentication: User authentication with login and registration.
  • 📊 Real-Time Data: Updates product information dynamically.
  • ⚡ Single Page Application (SPA): Smooth and fast user experience using Angular.

Technology Stack:

  • 🅰️ Angular: Front-end framework for building a dynamic user interface.
  • 🛠️ JSON Server: Mock back-end to store product data.
  • 🎨 CSS & Tailwind: Responsive and modern UI design.

How It Works:

  1. 1️⃣ Users sign in or register for an account.
  2. 2️⃣ They can browse the inventory of available products.
  3. 3️⃣ Users can add new products, edit existing ones, or remove them.
  4. 4️⃣ The system ensures secure authentication and smooth navigation.

Future Enhancements:

We plan to integrate a **real database (MongoDB or Firebase)**, improve authentication with **JWT security**, and add **analytics dashboards** for tracking inventory performance.
